quest.name: Spelunker of Light
journal: This Uyagiri youth needs your help collecting something.
objectives: Deliver the sack of arrowheads to the Uyagiri youth.

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: Could you spare me a moment of your time? I require your help.

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: Meet me by the Uyagir Caves if you are willing. I shall tell you precisely what I want you to do there.

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: There are several arrowheads in these caves that I wish to trade with the Dotharl.

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: Normally I would collect them myself, but the caves are infested with Matanga. I asked for your aid as you look like quite a warrior. I do hope my judgment was not incorrect. Good luck!

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: Please bring the sack of arrowheads in there to me. Make sure you have your wits about youâ”€the place is swarming with Matanga.

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: Were you able to find the sack?

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: Yes, this should be more than enough to get what I require. You have my thanks.

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: Once upon a time our tribe used to call these caves home. They provided us with high-quality minerals, which we turned into arrowheads and spearheads. We would then sell those on to our fellow tribes.

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: However, the gods took issue with our actions. They sent Matanga to infest the cave and drove us out. They doubtless thought we were producing an excessive number of weapon parts.

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: After that we decided to only gather enough minerals to feed ourselves.

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: We no longer craft the arrowheads I require for this trade. As such, I had no choice but to collect them from these caves.

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, could you accompany me as far as Dotharl Khaa? I shall pay you for your work as soon as I have traded the arrowheads.

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: Ah, adventurer. I just finished trading the arrowheads. I now have enough food to last me for the next month or so.

dialogue.name: UYAGIR02799
dialogue.text: Thank you once again. May the gods continue to smile upon you.

dialogue.name: AGUJAM
dialogue.text: These arrowheads are sharp enough to pierce even the thickest of matamata hides. I could scarce believe my ears when I heard there were still a few left in those caves.
